name: Izzy Izumi & Joe Kido
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If your opponent has 2 or more Digimon in play, gain 2 memory.[Opponent's Turn] When one of your black Digimon is deleted, you may suspend this Tamer to trigger ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
